text: Leon A. Gorman (December 20, 1934 - September 3, 2015) was an American businessman and philanthropist. He was the President (1967-2001) and Chairman (2001-2013) of the bard for the clothing company L.L.Bean. He had a reported net worth of $860 million, and, until his death, was the richest person in Maine. He was born in Nashua, New Hampshire. Gorman died from cancer on September 3, 2015 in Yarmouth, Maine, aged 80. ==References== Category:2015 deaths Category:1934 births Category:American philanthropists Category:Cancer deaths in Maine Category:Businesspeople from Maine Category:Businesspeople from New Hampshire Category:People from Nashua, New Hampshire
title: Leon Gorman
